name: Eric & Yannik X
storyline: Don Glaber wipes out every human and animal. However, a human named Andrew survives, because Andrew became immortal after eating a golden apple. After failing to wipe out Andrew, Don Glaber, with the help of Smallglabers, Tallglabers, and Squareglabers, steals Andrew's money. Andrew tries to call law enforcement and the military, but even the law enforcement and the military has been wiped out. Now, it's up to Eric, Yannik, Kabir, Mateo, Akkha, Listrik, or Berat to wipe out Don Glaber and return the stolen money to Andrew.
